casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

December 8, 2006

[Cite as 12/812006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-6442.]

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

2006-2157. State ex rel. Bernard v. Melfi.

In Mandamus. On motion to dismiss. Motion to dismiss granted. Cause dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Lundberg Stratton, O'Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, X, dissents and would deny the motion and refer the matter immediately to the court’s mediator.
